subtitle.subtitle: ARE YOU SELF-EMPLOYED OR A COMPANY?

card-text1.title: We are the strategic partner to bundle your energies and expand your customer base.

card-text3.title: Become a partner and you will have all the advantages of belonging to a large network:

parrafo1.linea1: - Network with coverage in mainland Spain and the Balearic Islands
parrafo1.linea2: - Training plan on electricity, gas and energy efficiency products
